alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Hardee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Pinellas; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 12:47PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Hardee, Manatee, southern Pinellas, southern Hillsborough, Polk and northwestern Sarasota Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 1247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Winter Haven to 7 miles east of Fish Hawk to near Fort Desoto Park. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Lakeland, Sarasota, Bradenton, Plant City, Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Palmetto, Wauchula, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Fort Desoto Park, Fish Hawk, Saint Petersburg, Brandon, St. Petersburg, St. Pete Beach and Anna Maria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
